selector: input[type='hidden'][autocomplete], input[autocomplete]:not([type]), input[type='text'][autocomplete], input[type='number'][autocomplete], input[type='month'][autocomplete], input[type='date'][autocomplete], input[type='search'], input[type='password'], input[type='url'], input[type='email'], input[type='tel'], textarea, select
